product_name: Burton Twist Bomber Insulated Jacket - Girls'
long_description: The Burton Twist Bomber jacket features waterproof performance and plenty of insulation to keep your girl dry and warm while she's boarding or playing in blizzards. Polyester shell with DRYRIDE Durashell(TM) waterproof, breathable coating and fully taped seams keeps snow and moisture at bay. Insulated with strategically placed Thermacore(TM) polyester fill for reliable warmth. Taffeta lining slides on easily over other layers. Insulated hood provides ample warmth and protection; tricot-lined chin guard prevents zipper abrasion. Burton Twist Bomber jacket features Room-To-Grow(TM) system that lets you lengthen sleeves as your child grows.
